senses.sense_definition: Acronym of North Atlantic Treaty Organization; an intergovernmental military alliance between North American and European countries established to ensure mutual defense.

examples.text: The country applied to join <w>NATO</w> to ensure its national security.
Leaders from every <w>NATO</w> member state gathered in Brussels for the annual summit.

senses.sense_definition: Acronym of National Association of Theatre Owners; a trade organization representing cinema owners and operators.

examples.text: The <w>NATO</w> convention is the largest gathering of movie theater owners in the world.
New projection standards were discussed by the board of <w>NATO</w> last week.

senses.sense_definition: Acronym for "No Action Talk Only"; a term used to describe someone who talks about doing things but never actually takes action.

examples.text: The management team is just <w>NATO</w>; they hold endless meetings but solve nothing.
Don't be <w>NATO</w>â€”if you promise to help, you actually have to do the work.

senses.sense_definition: A tropical tree of the genus Mora, or the hard, reddish wood obtained from it.

examples.text: The heavy table was constructed from solid <w>nato</w> wood.
Botanists identified several species of <w>nato</w> growing in the rainforest.
